title: When Community Becomes UI: Building the Website for the First Three.js Conference
partialText: How Makio64 & Hervé Studio designed threejs.paris, the website of the very first Three.js conference, to make every visitor part of the show!

title: Gabriel Norman: From Gaming Culture to High-End Interactive Experiences
partialText: How gaming culture, typographic discipline, and a passion for motion design converged into a career building immersive digital experiences.

title: Building Async Page Transitions in Vanilla JavaScript
partialText: Learn how to build a lightweight SPA router with true async crossfade page transitions using Vanilla JavaScript, GSAP, and Vite — no framework required.

title: Reshaping Telha Clarke’s Digital Home from Wordmark to Motion System
partialText: A behind-the-scenes look at balancing clean layouts and thoughtful motion for Telha Clarke’s new identity.

title: From Flat to Spatial: Creating a 3D Product Grid with React Three Fiber
partialText: A practical walkthrough of building a curved 3D product grid with React Three Fiber and GLSL, covering shaders, animation, and performance.

title: Composite Rendering: The Brilliance Behind Inspiring WebGL Transitions
partialText: Explore composite rendering in WebGL and how render targets power seamless transitions and advanced scene compositing.

title: Cinematic Presence: The Director’s Cut of the Jason Bergh Experience
partialText: This is Brooklyn grit in a darkroom palette—italicized first letters, cream-toned “film stock” whites, and UI details pulled straight from the edge of a 35mm strip.

title: Creating a Smooth Horizontal Parallax Gallery: From DOM to WebGL
partialText: Build a smooth horizontal parallax gallery in DOM/CSS/JS, then upgrade it to GPU-powered WebGL (Three.js) with shaders.

title: Joffrey Spitzer Portfolio: A Minimalist Astro + GSAP Build with Reveals, Flip Transitions and Subtle Motion
partialText: Building a minimalist, smooth portfolio with Astro + GSAP: reveals, page transitions and subtle animations, crafted with restraint and precision.

title: Reactive Depth: Building a Scroll-Driven 3D Image Tube with React Three Fiber
partialText: Build a scroll-driven, infinitely looping 3D image tube in React Three Fiber powered by shaders, inertia, and a unified motion system.
